title: Can I get into good US universities with high SAT score but low GPA? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is it possible to be admitted to a good college with a low GPA but high SAT score? May not be feasible - for two reasons at a good college Which review your application holistically and low GPA does not fit that bill.High academic curriculum GPA is the one that gives the college confidence that you are college ready and can sustain excellence for another four years of study. Excellence in SAT score is a short term and momentary achievement.

Excellence in SAT / standardized test is one of achievement. Excellence in academic is sustained and year long process, which is what valued more, at least by premier colleges, in USA. How can you get admitted by MIT for undergraduate studies? and How do I get into Stanford? will guide you further to understand what these colleges look for.
